channel.title: LLM on Notes from the digital underground by Lngnmn
channel.description: Recent content in LLM on Notes from the digital underground by Lngnmn

item.title: LLM Bullshit-3
item.description: It is more or less obvious why AI and LLM bubble is so huge - imagine just charging money for every https request to a RESTful API, without, literally, being responsible about the quality of the responce (it is not out fault if a LLM returned bullshit to you, or, which is much worse – a highly sophisiticated, convincing subtle bullshit). Again, there is not enough good code to train a model on it.
